# primary

**Type Property**

A constant that represents the primary button on the input device.

## Declaration

```swift
static var primary: UIEvent.ButtonMask { get }
```

## Accessing button masks

- **secondary**: A constant that represents the secondary button on the input device.

items.description: A constant that represents the secondary button on the input device.
items.name: secondary
